sentences.sentence: The figure belongs to one of the colossi of the facade.
sentences.translation: 该头像属于神殿正面的一尊巨像。

sentences.sentence: One Colossi will be able to kill a group of Marines with one sweep of its lasers.
sentences.translation: 一个巨像的一次激光扫射可以干掉一队的机枪兵。

sentences.sentence: The Colossi, like other ground units, will be able to move through shallow waters only.
sentences.translation: 巨像，像其他的地面单位，只能在浅水中移动。
